string.value: You meet Chief Stan in #b#m100000000##k through #p1052103#'s introduction. Talk to #bChief Stan#k, who seems a bit doubtful.

Chief Stan questions how the son of a farmer could have gotten so strong and says he wants to test you. The test is to go to the #m910600000#, hunt the #r#o3000001#s#k there, and bring back #b#t4000068#s#k. You can enter #m910600000# through the Warning Sign at the #m106010100#...\r\n\r\n#i4000068# #t4000068# #b#c4000068# / 2
Even having received the #t4000068#s, Chief Stan still seems a bit doubtful.

According to this Letter of Introduction, you are the strong adventurer #p1052103# has chosen to send me. But you're #p1013103#'s second child, not a strong adventurer! I thought I could count on #p1052103#, but I guess I was wrong.\r\n#L0##bI'm actually really strong. Believe me.#l\n#k

You may have spent your time chasing a few monsters instead of helping out at the farm, but I need a competent adventurer. If you really are capable, prove your strength to me. Why don't I give you a little test?

Do you know a monster called #o3000001#? It's small but quite powerful. If you enter from the Warning Post at #m106010100#, you'll find a Hidden Street leading to Golem's Temple. Defeat the #r#o3000001##k in #b#m106010102##k and bring me a #b#t4000068##k. Then I will recognize you as a true adventurer.
Stop wasting time trying to be someone you're not and go help your father at the farm. You...? An adventurer...? HA!

Hm, I don't believe this. You've really brought me a #t4000068#. You're stronger than I thought. But don't get excited. The monster you have to battle is much more powerful than #o3000001#. \r\n#L0##bI'm much more powerful than #o3000001# as well. Stop worrying and let me help you.#l\n#k
Let me think about it a little longer.

Haven't you found the #b#t4000068##k yet? Perhaps you can handle a monster like #o3000001#, but I'm sure you don't want to go near a scary monster like Golem. Stop wasting both of our time and just forfeit if you don't think you can pull it off.
